item.title: Magikarp Ground Mission
item.description: Challenge Rating Artificialness: 4/10 Skill: 3/10 Time: 5-10 minutes Learn more about how we rate challenges here. What is SSH? SSH (Secure SHell) is a protocol for securely transmitting commands to a remote computer. It makes it possible to access files, run commands, and more, just from inside the terminal. More information can be found here. Doing the challenge Pico already gives you the command to use. When you first log in, the directory you’re in has 1of3.
